Yes, this affects the Windows version of genBSDF (actually wrapBSDF, which it calls) as well.  I don't believe there has been an update to the Windows installers since the fix, which went in mid-October.  We were hoping to make a new 5.1 release, but have been delayed by some fixes we need to make to the photon-mapping code.  Roland is recovering from surgery.  Please take the opportunity to wish him well!


Cheers,
-Greg
